Title: Magic Pussy: Chapter 1
description: Unveil the sultry world of an adult only dating sim in a Magic World universe. Explore the carnal desires of bewitching witches, learn alluring spells, and form passionate connections. Your choices define your destiny; seduce and entice your way into the hearts and beds of captivating sorceresses.

Title: Stronghold HD (2012)
description: The original castle sim, Stronghold HD allows you to design, build and destroy historical castles. Engage in medieval warfare against the AI in one of two single player campaigns or online with up to 8 players.

Title: Flight 74
description: Do you have what it takes to survive and become the ultimate pilot? Run missions for the South American Cartel and prove your worthiness.

Title: Q.U.B.E. 2
description: Q.U.B.E. 2 is the sequel to the hit first-person puzzle game Q.U.B.E. You are Amelia Cross, a stranded archaeologist who has awoken among the ruins of an ancient alien landscape. With the distant help of another survivor you must solve the puzzles of this mysterious world and find a way back home.

Title: Medieval Idle: Quest
description: Medieval Idle: Quest is a captivating game that will transport you back to the middle ages. This idle game combines the elements of simulation and strategy to create a truly engaging experience for gamers of all ages.

Title: Detective Agency
description: Exciting adventure game with a stylish comic graphics and lots of puzzles, riddles and mini games. Fun for the whole family.

Title: Epic Manager - Create Your Own Adventuring Agency!
description: Epic Manager is a unique crossover between Sports Management and classic JRPGs. Experience an addictive “one more turn” mix of tycoon strategy, roguelike elements, roster management, combat and character progression, all rooted in an epic yet light-hearted fantasy setting. Rated ‘E’ for EPIC!

Title: Press Any Button
description: This video game realized how boring it had been and now is trying its best to fix that.

Title: Sex Standing
description: Dare to cultivate intimate connections in Sex Standing a titillating escapade that pushes the limits of adult gaming. Set in a ravaged world, you assume the role of a sex courier, entrusted with the mission of reestablishing connections between secluded settlements and nurturing close relationships

Title: Giana Sisters 2D
description: Giana Sisters 2D is a HD remake of the beloved Nintendo DS game from 2009. It features full controller support, precise, intuitive controls and a smooth learning curve. All balanced for hours of fun and challenge.

Title: Record of Lodoss War-Deedlit in Wonder Labyrinth-
description: A 2D Metroidvania-style game developed under the supervision of Ryo Mizuno, depicting the story of Deedlit and the events leading up to Record of Lodoss War: Diadem of the Covenant. Use a variety of weapons and spirit powers to unravel the mystery of the labyrinth.

Title: Hentai Girls VR
description: This forest is a home for breathtaking, all natural nude anime beauties, who are ready to meet you and to let you know them very, very deeply…

Title: Lair Land Story
description: Decide a mysterious girl's fate in this stunning visual novel raising sim!

Title: Many Minigames
description: Singleplayer Wario Ware-like minigame collection with a challenge mode and global leaderboard.
genre: Action, Casual, Indie, Sports, Early Access

Title: PLATI NALOG: Favorite Russian Game
description: Attention: after this game you can begin to worry about the ordinary Russian person. Perhaps you will even feel sorry for him.

Title: Mini Island: Spring
description: Mini Island: Spring is a one small hold & Gun, boss Rush mini-game of Casual difficulty!

Title: Rogue Door Defense
description: Rogue Door Defense is a tower defense mazing game with rogue-lite elements. Choose a door, defeat the enemies behind it and claim your unique reward. Build and upgrade different towers. Design your own maze to defend your lives against the attacking waves of monsters and powerful bosses.

Title: Jewel Match Solitaire Summertime
description: Summer, Sun, and Solitaire! Grab some cards and keep cool in the shade. It’s time for a picnic and a game of Solitaire! Jewel Match turns up the heat with this Solitaire Summer Edition. Travel the lands and explore more than 300 levels, restoring 5 beautiful summer escapes!

Title: Drum Roll
description: Have you ever wanted to roll an oil drum? Roll the drum as far as you want with Drum Roll!

Title: Infini
description: Lose yourself in Infinity… but never lose Hope. Try to escape a world of never-ending puzzles and oddities.

Title: Block Hopper
description: A short 2D platformer meant to be enjoyed at your own pace and possibly annoy you with its challenges.

Title: Hard landing: Arrival
description: An economic strategy where the player must adapt the colony to support human life on an uncharted planet. Production puzzles and unforeseen disasters await the player.

Title: The Journey - Episode 2: Words of Wisdom
description: The second step that you never knew you needed to take to get to wherever you're wanting to go... You won't regret this experience. You have nothing to lose, and everything to gain...

Title: Ghost Stories
description: You find yourself in a deserted territory of a country house, and when you try to get out, understand that it's impossible. One on one with ghosts and your task is to survive and only then to figure out what happened here...

Title: The Game We All Have To Play
description: A word of caution to disclaim: it's more a poetry than a game. The story goes the way you pull it. A bullet hell without bullets. What would I call it for my part? A piece of something. I hope, of art.

Title: Cryodeath VR
description: Procedurally generated survival horror.

Title: Zodiacats
description: Follow cat Catherine on her journey for the lost astrology papyri and learn more about her job as a witch assistant for bringing good vibes into this Earth! Let Catherine guide you through the zodiac wheel, showing you about features of each solar sign. You can also learn about your cat's sign!

Title: Horny Sekai
description: Horny Sekai is a visual novel where you need to draw magic symbols to defeat monsters. Meet hot girls who live in this world. Enjoy smooth and realistic CG animation and feel the deep characters of the heroines. Give gifts and spend time with them to build relationships.

Title: SKIBIDI BACKROOMS
description: SKIBIDI BACKROOMS is a cooperative horror game for a group of 1-8 players. Solo mode is also available. You have to survive among the BACKROOMS and find a way out before you are overtaken by the SKIBIDIST. Updates and various interesting things await you...

Title: DRUM'N'BASS MASSACRE
description: DRUM'N'BASS MASSACRE is a high-velocity aerial combat shooter where you destoy your enemies while performing unimaginable maneuvers using your interstellar interceptor, accompanied by original drum and bass soundtrack

Title: ISLANDERS
description: ISLANDERS is a minimalist strategy game about building cities on colorful islands.

Title: Sora no Ao to Shiro to
description: 《天空的蓝与白/如梭夏日》是由日本美少女游戏品牌Barista Lab于2022年夏天推出的一款恋爱小品作。由知名原画师SesenaYau担当人物设计与原画，由咏野万知子编写剧本，并由知名音乐制作人大川茂伸制作音乐。

Title: Game Of Puzzles: Nature
description: A puzzle game in which you have to assemble a single image from individual pieces.

Title: JetX Space Edition
description: JetX Space edition is out of this world! The new ambitious arena-shooter game features arcade racing, epic arena battles, and a rich variety of game modes. Race, compete, destroy!

Title: Grim Legends: The Forsaken Bride
description: Enter an enchanting world of legends and magic, where your destiny was written in blood and whispers of true love.

Title: Avoid The Rain 2
description: This is an agile parkour game. You can dodge quickly to avoid raindrops falling from the sky and go to the designated place.

Title: Furry Pride
description: Exciting casual puzzle game with beautiful furry girls. Amazing atmosphere, great music, high quality furry artworks, great for relaxing. Made with love from furry lovers for furry lovers!

Title: PetShop
description: "PetShop" is the app that exports VRM format avatars with pets & items. Dogs, cats, sharks, squirrels, elephants, dragons, and many other animals. You can also use animal ears, tails and hats. The exported avatars can be used in VRM compatible metaverse. Join the Metaverse with "PetShop"!

Title: Grisaia Phantom Trigger Vol.8
description: At last, an all-out war is at hand. The battle against the religious organization, The Fatal Answer (TFA), has entered its final phase, with CIRS and SORD preparing to send all of their troops into TFA's stronghold.

Title: I Can't Believe It's Not Gambling 2(K)
description: Hey sports gamers, we heard you like "NOT gambling" in your sports games so we went ahead and took most of the sports out, to give you what we KNOW you all want! More not gambling!!!This is a gambling simulation game (with basketball on the side).

Title: Arizona Sunshine® 2
description: It's time to say hello to your old pal, Fred. Arizona Sunshine® 2, the next-gen sequel to the fan-favorite VR apocalypse, packs even more gore-geous zombie action! And what's better than braving the end of the f*cking world alone? Surviving it with your new best friend--Buddy.

Title: Projekt: Passion - Season 1
description: A futuristic adult visual novel filled with sex, comedy, drama, violence, and more sex. Go on a fun-filled space adventure and develop relationships with a diverse cast of characters with their own personalities and motivations.

Title: Lucifer Within Us
description: Solve 3 increasingly intricate murders by examining the evidence -- find the motive, the means, and the opportunity. Use testimonies of the suspects as evidence by examining every detail for contradictions... and signs of sin. Purify the possessed. Purge the daemons.

Title: My Bike
description: Choose from one of three different motorcycle models and try it on the track!

Title: Kathy Rain: Director's Cut
description: The award-winning point-and-click adventure returns in the Director's Cut with an extended story, additional puzzles, and new areas to explore. Witness the rise of an iconic detective as you uncover a dark and sinister truth hiding behind the calm exterior of a small rural town.

Title: Q.U.B.E. 10th Anniversary
description: Entirely rebuilt from the ground up, Q.U.B.E. 10th Anniversary is the ultimate celebration of the decade-old original, bringing refined visuals, completely redesigned and revised gameplay sections, and a whole new chapter to the award-winning, brain-twisting first-person puzzler.

Title: Gems of Magic: Father's Day
description: Rescue the lost son in this Match 3 Adventure, a story of a father and son enjoying Father’s Day until things go wrong. Enjoy the hand-drawn scenes and great visuals. Make smart use of the power-ups. Remove all obstacles during the quest. Reunite father and son in over 100 levels full of challenges.

Title: Black Smith3
description: You are a blacksmith in a small rural village. You steadfastly earn your living by hammering out products daily, but at night, you take your earnings and go to town to seek out innocent and cute girls. Continue improving your experience and skills, so that you can raise the price of your products.

Title: We. The Refugees: Ticket to Europe
description: ‘We. The Refugees: Ticket to Europe’ is a socially engaged, text-based RPG about a journalist looking for his big break by uncovering the plights of refugees travelling from Africa to Europe. It is a story inspired by true events.

Title: Tonight, I Die in My Sleep
description: Navigate broken memories in a powerless fantasy fueled equally by nightmares and confessional poetry.

Title: Epic Car Factory
description: Epic Car Factory puts you in the drivers seat of your very own car company. Build, market, hire, fire, and more in this fast paced business simulation. The failure and success of the company depends entirely on your decisions and how you react to the ever changing market place.

Title: Latte Stand Tycoon +
description: Use your barista and math skills to mix the perfect latte and rebuild your family home and cafe to their former glory.

Title: Fantasy Jigsaw Puzzle 2
description: Challenging 6 x 6 jigsaw puzzles featuring fantasy male characters.

Title: Hidden Shapes Animals - VR
description: Tired after a hard day at work? Now, with the help of VR, you will delve deep into an environment exclusively prepared for you to have fun and rescue your tranquility, surprising yourself with each solved puzzle!

Title: Frontline: Panzer Blitzkrieg!
description: Fight your way through 35 Unique WW2 battles - Aim your targets carefully, counter-attack, and strategically coordinate your Squads. The study of enemy tactics and the use of Special abilities will lead to victory!

Title: 100 hidden dogs
description: Hidden object game in the alien setting. Black and white hand-drawn graphics in a cartoon style. A large location and cute dogs.

Title: Mindless Running
description: Mindless Running - it's a classic runner with story mode. Explore a randomly-generated world while listening to a unique soundtrack!

Title: Isle of Jura
description: Take a fishing trip to Jura, a remote and beautiful island. Explore, meet the locals, and catch delicious fish!

Title: SEMU
description: Space adventure can be scary, so that's why we at InkForge Studios have developed the most advanced Space Suit ever - the SEMU suit. Standing for Survival Extra-vehicular Mobility Unit, it will keep you safe as you journey the cosmos. With survival guaranteed, what else is there to worry about?

Title: Mirror
description: This is a game that combines match-3, GALGAME elements and beauties. If you want to learn more about those beauties, you need to best them first. How the story goes is choice-based so your choices will ultimately decide their fate.

Title: I commissioned some letters
description: I paid more artists to hide letters and stamps in 15 pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

Title: Space Pilgrim Academy: Year 2
description: As Margaret Dale enters her second year at the academy, she begins to suspect that one of her classmates might possess some unusual abilities. Meanwhile, Gail and Sabina undertake an investigation into suspicious activities at Union Station.

Title: Blade Bros IMPACT!
description: "Welcome to Blade Bros Impact!, a action rpg game with several essences from the classics rpg from 16 and 32 bits era!, enjoy dynamic battle, scary bosses, get more powerful by gain levels, get swords, rods, bows, axes and so forth!".

Title: Last Floor
description: Оne day your life changes dramatically and you become a hostage of your own home. Your task is to survive but to do this you need to get outside.

Title: Saint Hell
description: Saint Hell is a 2D RPG in which you will need to choose the side of angels or demons and lead them to victory.
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Racing, RPG, Simulation, Sports, Strategy

Title: Thrice in a row
description: Thrice in a row is a logic game for creating chains of identical elements. The goal of the game is to put in a row from 3 identical elements, get points and go to the next level There are also bonuses. There are 28 different levels available.

Title: Space Block Buster
description: Re-experience the feel of a classic arcade game, but this time in VR! Use buffs, power-ups, and different rackets to clear the stages faster than your friends. Work your way up the global leaderboard until you’re number 1 in the galaxy!

Title: Eleven Islands
description: Enjoy a thrilling match3 game! Disaster struck the Tribe of the Eleven Islands. A volcano eruption covered the tropical islands with lava and ash, which destroyed their houses and crops. It's up to you to restore houses, groves and crops for the tribe members.

Title: VR Pterosaur Rock Climbing
description: This is a thrilling 3D virtual VR game, in which you can experience the intense and exciting rock climbing.

Title: Robotex
description: Life on Earth is unsustainable. Humanity must seek a new home but the only planet found is very hostile. You were sent on a expedition to slay the monsters inhabiting the surface of this planet. In this adventure you end up being the villain. Game contains two basic controls, many puzzles and lots of guns and enemies.

Title: Blagmoz
description: Dash, cast, and buff your way to the top of Blagmoz Tower in this lightning-fast PVP precision platformer. Power up by drinking potions, getting kills, and sacrificing your friends at the Altar. Become the ultimate glass cannon in this one-hit-kill battle of sorceries, online or on the couch!

Title: SOUNDART
description: Become one with sound and beauty...Pound, swing, and thrust away! A revolution in VR rhythm games!The automatically generated "scores" are literally infinite... Make - no, BECOME art, together with your favorite music!Show off your skills live as you play and get the audience rocking!

Title: The Longest Road on Earth
description: A thoughtful and deeply personal title with stripped-down mechanics. The lack of dialogue or text allows you to create your own narrative through your time with four characters. Each short story will allow players to be swept away by the haunting lyrics of over twenty original, nostalgic songs.

Title: Jane Austen's 8-bit Adventure
description: Play as Jane Austen, English novelist, in this 2D platforming adventure. Explore 8-bit England, fight enemies with your quill, and confront characters from Jane Austen's novels!

Title: DiamondFalls
description: DiamondFalls is a captivating and challenging match-3 puzzle game for enthusiasts of the genre. Players must solve each puzzle by collecting all diamonds and balls of the same color in a specific order within a limited amount of time.

Title: Grisaia Phantom Trigger Vol.4
description: Taiga is an elementary student applying to join Class A, the combat unit. Her transfer is approved, but there's one catch: Chris must supervise her. All is well until a terrorist attack breaks out, and Chris rushes off alone. SORD is powerless - what will they do?

Title: Dealer Simulator
description: Dealer Simulator invites you to a world where your bargaining skills will be tested to the limits, and you'll never know what lies behind each door. Are you ready to become a top-tier trader? Join the warehouse adventure with Dealer Simulator!

Title: Hunkenstein
description: The most fearsome monsters of classic cinema are now common household pests. You're the new exterminator in town. Unlicensed, of course. Shoot, crush, burn, or mulch these physics-based ghouls, then collect the check.

Title: Russian Prison Sport: OCHKO
description: And what will you sacrifice in order to survive? OCHKO?

Title: Last Anime Boy 2: Hentai Zombie Hell
description: In 2088, Nazi Muslims achieved great success in the field of chemical weapons and, not to fall into captivity and fight even after death with the infidels, they created a serum that turned them into zombies.

Title: Okashi Towers
description: Okashi Towers is a Real Time Strategy game with Tower Defense elements. Gather candy resources to build tower units or go on offense and summon creatures to attack other player bases. Join with up to 8 players and choose one of the four factions that fits your play style best

Title: Space Pilgrim Episode IV: Sol
description: Locked away in the most secure prison in the galaxy, with little hope of escape, Gail Pilgrim faces the most difficult ordeals of her life. Her only hope lies in trusting those who she has come to regard as her friends.

Title: PenBall
description: There is a ball on a small field with a top view. Your gate is at the bottom, and your opponent's gate is at the top. Your goal is to score the ball into the opponent's goal.

Title: Offroad Jeep 4x4: Car Driving Simulator
description: In this offroad game, become a great 4x4 car driver in a big town.

Title: The Sand Man
description: “I’ll tell you a scary story. It’s so scary you might not be able to take it. It’s the story of the Sand Man...” This is the second title in the Strange Man series, developed by Uri Games. Unable to sleep and exhausted, Sophie wanders into a town where everything sleeps. That is where the terror begins...

Title: Cyberpunk Sex Simulator
description: A simulator in the style of cyberpunk that will cheer you up! And in fact, not only the mood. In this game, control takes only one hand!

Title: 1001 Jigsaw. Castles And Palaces 4
description: Majestic buildings and architecture from different eras. Assemble puzzles and enjoy great pictures.

Title: Deus Ex: The Fall
description: Deus Ex: The Fall is set in 2027– a golden era for science, technology and human augmentation, but also a time of great social divide and global conspiracy. Powerful corporations have seized control from governments and command the drug supply needed by augmented humans to survive.

Title: Five elements for 24!
description: On that day, mankind remembered the fear of being dominated by the math Olympiad in primary school. 4 random numbers, 3 operations, get 24 points!

Title: Stranded In Time
description: Stranded In Time takes you on a fun and exciting adventure to explore a mystery out of this world! Play as Olivia - a young woman from a big city - who joins her uncle Peter and writer Nick on an exploration of an abandoned church that hides a secret beyond any wild dream!

Title: 8 Ball 2
description: Drive the crowd wild with your skills.

Title: Flow:The Sliding
description: Enjoy the rhythmic music and beat the SCORE!!!

Title: Stack Masters
description: Do you enjoy playing around with the physics in games? Then this is the game for you. Stack Masters is built around exploring that concept in a competitive way. Including a built in level editor and Steam Workshop support, the game offers a never ending supply of physics sandbox gameplay to explore.

Title: The logic inside
description: Purpose of the game: You need to draw a line on the screen from point A to point B. The game has 13 levels. The difficulty increases with each level. There are teleports, enemies.

Title: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? Infinite Combate
description: Experience the anime from DanMachi. Follow the story from the beginning and discover new content in the game! Enter the world of Orario, where gods live amongst humans and protect them in their Familia - become the greatest adventurer through dungeon-crawling, real-time RPG combat and date events!

Title: Blender Bros
description: Blender Bros. is a cheerful interplanetary platform adventure with an emphasis on exploration and collecting cute little creatures called Mini Bros.

Title: Marauders
description: Marauders is a tactical first-person multiplayer looter shooter set in a sci-fi universe. As a space pirate, work solo, or in a squad with up to 3 other players to navigate a hostile battleground, hunt for loot, craft new weapons and gear, and salvage what you’ll need to survive.

Title: Decoherence
description: Build robots, devise a battle plan and fight alongside them!
genre: Action, Indie, Strategy, Free to Play

Title: Ultimate ADOM - Caverns of Chaos
description: Experience the sequel of the traditional roguelike dungeon-crawling classic. Enjoy unlimited replayability through endless procedurally generated dungeons, countless monsters, grafting, crafting and a vast amount of skill trees. Journey into the ever changing depths of the Caverns of Chaos.

Title: Heroine Anthem Zero -Sacrifice-
description: 《Heroine Anthem Zero : Sacrifice》 is an epic fantasy 2D side-scrolling ARPG with Japanese voiceovers and support for 7 languages. In a world unforgiven by God, it is a story of sacrifice and survival ten years in the making. Come and enter a world of adventure from long ago.

Title: Her Heart's Desire: A Landlord Epic
description: Become a writer with a drinking problem and enjoy the debauchery when you rent out the spare bedrooms in your new house to three gorgeous women. Can you romance Daisy, Lily, and Rose? Find out in this farcical adult visual novel where you make the choices!

Title: Real Zombie War Simulator
description: Destroy all zombies with sniper or other gun in this zombie game.

Title: LoveChoice
description: "What is love?" We try to answer that with this game. The game encourages people to have a warm, soft, and understanding heart.

Title: Dark Dead
description: Dark Dead is a hardcore 2D action-platformer in which you have to fight an ancient evil and try to understand how and why you ended up in this place.
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Racing, RPG, Simulation, Sports, Strategy

Title: Tinhead
description: Leap, slide, hop, fly and shoot your way through wacky worlds and super-tricky challenging levels as you guide Tinhead to free the stars. Take on pesky spinning Krystals, relentless flying Saw-Sirs and hordes of mega-tough bosses.

Title: Hungry Flame
description: Hungry flame is an action packed, vibrant game. The main goal is saving yourself from the flame that is chasing you.

Title: Defense of Egypt: Cleopatra Mission
description: A game of the genre "Tower Defense" ( TD ) in the setting of ancient Egypt.

Title: Spot The Dot
description: A little game where you have to break objects at an ever increasing rate.

Title: My Girlfriend is a Musician
description: “My Girlfriend is a Musician” is a Music Tour Management Simulator and Yuri Dating Simulator. Play as an aspiring junior tour manager helming a series of concerts around Europe for an eccentric yet extremely entertaining Rockstar!

Title: Sea of Choices
description: With both RPG and Time Management mechanics, plot out your day to day life in the shoes of Aura! In combat use turn-based tactics to employ a strategy that leads to victory! Or just chill out and collect records and read books!

Title: Recursive Ruin
description: A story rich narrative puzzle game in which an artist comes to terms with their grief. Explore an infinitely recursive world of strange fractal beauty and solve mind-bending puzzles. Confront the ineffable and chat with your cat in a search for meaning and hope.

Title: Feed Him
description: Welcome to Feed Him, a horror-themed adventure game set in a small, innocent-looking town. Uncover dark secrets, explore eerie places, defeat your evil roommate and escape before it's too late. Immerse yourself in a spine-chilling experience with stunning graphics.

Title: Gas Station Simulator
description: Buy an abandoned gas station and restore it to its full glory. Renovate, upgrade and expand upon the offered services to keep up with your clients demands.

Title: Succubus in Wonderland
description: A man falls into a well and finds himself in a castle full of busty succubuses. After running into "Louise", the Queen's daughter, she offers to help the man find his way home...
